name: kpievents
description: KPIEvents is calendar that structures all events in KPI.

scripts.start: start npm run client && start npm run server && start npm run bot
scripts.build: npm run install && (npm run client & npm run server & npm run bot)
scripts.install: (cd client/ && npm i) & (cd server/ && npm i) & (cd telegram-bot/ & npm i)

author: Kishko Igor, Aidymyrova Nadi, Borshosh Sasha
